channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘Self-deporting’ immigrants are pulling their kids out of school to flee the U.S. Experts say it spells trouble for schools that depend on student enrollments for funding
item.description: "Every student that walks in the door gets a chunk of money with it, not just federal money, but state and local money, too."

item.title: The pace of innovation in tech has accelerated from years to months thanks to AI, Microsoft chief privacy officer says
item.description: "Now the pace of innovation has just accelerated. What used to take years to get out now takes months," Julie Brill said.

item.title: Chris Brown is out on bail after allegedly assaulting a music producer during his last tour. His next world tour starts next month
item.description: A prosecutor said Brown punched, kicked, and struck Abe Diaw several times with a bottle. The attack was caught on camera in a club full of people.

item.title: European Parliament VP discovered there was nowhere in the building to change a diaper—it took the length of her pregnancy to change that
item.description: Silvana Koch-Merin said "glass walls" exist in parliament that stop women working in more technical roles.

item.title: Gerry Connolly is dead at 75. He was one of the leading voices calling for a full investigation of Elon Musk and DOGE
item.description: The late House Oversight Committee ranking member also demanded the Trump administration turn over documents about Musk’s potential conflicts of inter...

item.title: U.K. government bond auction bidding extended due to Bloomberg terminal woes
Stocks slide as Treasury yields move higher amid tax bill debate — live updates
Target slashes earnings guidance for the year
Why Nvidia’s CEO thinks U.S. export controls on chips haven’t worked
